giops_month.help:
Global Ice Ocean Prediction System 
     
  • Global Coverage
    •  
  • Tri-polar ORCA grid 1/4° resolution (ORCA025), < 15km in Arctic
    •  
  • 50 vertical z-levels
    •  
  • Available as monthly averages (May 2014–April 2015)
    •  
  • Variables Available: 
       
    • Ice Concentration
      •  
    • Ice Volume
      •  
    • Meridional Wind
      •  
    • Salinity
      •  
    • Sea Surface Height (Free Surface)
      •  
    • Sea Water Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water East Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water North Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water X Velocity
      •  
         
      • water velocity along model x grid lines
        •  
       
    • Sea Water Y Velocity
      •  
         
      • water velocity along model y grid lines
        •  
       
    • Water Temperature
      •  
    • Wind
      •  
    • Zonal Wind
      •  
     
    •

riops_daily.help:
Regional Ice Ocean Prediction System 
     
  • North Atlantic and Arctic
    •  
  • Tri-polar ORCA grid 1/12° resolution
    •  
  • 50 vertical z-levels
    •  
  • Available as daily values on 3 hr intervals from 00:00 (May 28, 2016 to present)
    •  
  • Variables Available: 
       
    • Depth-Integrated Sea Ice Strength
      •  
    • Depth-Integrated Internal Sea Ice Pressure
      •  
    • Ocean Mixed Layer Depth Based on Density Criterion
      •  
    • Sea Ice Area Fraction
      •  
    • Sea Ice Volume Per Unit Grid Cell Area
      •  
    • Sea Ice Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Ice East Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Ice North Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Ice X Velocity
      •  
         
      • ice velocity along model x grid lines
        •  
       
    • Sea Ice Y Velocity
      •  
         
      • ice velocity along model y grid lines
        •  
       
    • Sea Surface Height Above Geoid
      •  
    • Sea Water Potential Temperature
      •  
    • Sea Water Salinity
      •  
    • Sea Water Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water East Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water North Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Water X Velocity
      •  
         
      • water velocity along model x grid lines
        •  
       
    • Sea Water Y Velocity
      •  
         
      • water velocity along model y grid lines
        •  
       
    • Surface Temperature Of Snow Over Sea Ice Or Bare Sea Ice
      •  
    • Turbocline Depth
      •  
    • Volume Of Snow On Sea Ice Per Unit Grid Cell Area
      •  
     
    •
riops_daily.name: RIOPS Daily Average

  • Global Coverage
    •  
  • 1/4° Mercator grid
    •  
  • 75 vertical z-levels
    •  
  • Available as monthly averages (January 1993–December 2013)

      •  
    • Ice Concentration
      •  
    • Northward Velocity
      •  
    • Salinity
      •

      •  
    • Sea Ice Northward Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Ice Thickness
      •  
    • Sea Ice Velocity
      •  
    • Sea Surface Height
      •  
    • Sea Water Velocity
      •  
    • Temperature
      •  
     
    •
